name: @fdmg/css-grid
description: FDMG CSS Grid with Flexbox fallback

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc && webpack && npm run sass
scripts.release: npm update && npm install && yarn && npm run clean && npm run lint && tsc && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --env production && npm run sass
scripts.sass: npm run sass-grid && npm run sass-flex
scripts.sass-grid: npm run mkdir && node-sass --output-style=compressed scss/grid.scss -o dist/css
scripts.sass-flex: npm run mkdir && node-sass --output-style=compressed scss/flex.scss -o dist/css

author: Willem Liu
